knimeNode.name: Keras Average Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that adds two inputs.

fullDescription.intro: Takes two tensors of the same shape as input and adds them element-wise. Corresponds to the Add Keras layer.
fullDescription.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Average layer.
The Keras deep learning network that is the second input of this Average layer.
ports.outPort: The two input Keras deep learning networks merged into one by the added Average layer.
